short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is for MM employees to work on sharepoint.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the MM Sharepoint plugin for MMD - DLR - CRTV
Calculates the time spent on a ticket.

MMD - DLR - CRTV WorkLog is an internal extension that lets you.
1. Work on SharePoint tickets with simple Start, Pause and Stop buttons.
2. Calculates the time spent on tickets in SharePoint.
3. Removes manual entries in the time tracker.

Increase Productivity and save time.
